alert.note: Alert for Kuskokwim Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 27 at 10:04AM AKST until January 28 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Freezing rain and snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches from Bethel north and west. Ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch for areas south and east of Bethel. * WHERE...Kuskokwim Delta. * WHEN...From noon today to midnight AKST tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel may be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas west and north of Bethel should remain cool enough to see all snow. For areas south and east of Bethel, however, snow should quickly transition to freezing rain in the afternoon, then taper off around midnight Friday night. Bethel should see mostly snow, though there is the potential for periods of freezing rain mixed with snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
